entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriff kept in Sirius's mother's bedroom.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is the one who keeps Buckbeak and examines the locked cabinet.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly (Mrs. Weasley) agrees with Sirius that it might be a boggart.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is someone who should examine the locked cabinet before letting it out.

relationships.description: Sirius keeps Buckbeak in his mother's bedroom.
Molly agrees that it might be a boggart.
Sirius suggests letting Mad-Eye examine the locked cabinet.
